metadata.name: FRACTURED ISLANDS #1
metadata.description: Fractured Islands are a collection of 2,718 mishmashed mixed-up melange of mutant monsters.  These beings from 8 of the most famous avatar projects dating back to Spring 2021 live on 12 separate islands and were created from 40 tokens, and they are the intersection of generative art and pfp avatars.  This is a Plentefy artstamps.io project that demonstrates the power of intellectual property and creating art from it.
